title: Shakira  -  Live Madrid 2008  -  Rock In Rio.avi
description:
____________________________


Shakira  -  Live Madrid 2008  -  Rock In Rio

____________________________


First....  To be very clear.... :

1)  There is no "burning-Process" involved.
2)  There is no Winrar / Extracting / Zipping / or Passwording involved.
3)  You only download ONE File,  and thats it....
4)  Just click on the file, and Shakira will dance for you.....
5)  You are not allowed to dance with her....
6)  Well... Maybe on saturdays....

originally "Winrar-package" knows that.... :
